org.wiyn.etc.inputSpectrum.gui
Class SpectrumPanel

java.lang.Object

              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.wiyn.etc.inputSpectrum.gui.SpectrumPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlackbodyPanel, EmissionLinePanel, FlatFnPanel, KC96Panel, KuruczModelPanel, PowerLawPanel, UserSuppliedSpectrumPanel
public abstract class SpectrumPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

The panel for entering the relevant data for some spectrum can be divided in three parts. First, there is the checkbox for deciding whether to include the spectrum in the target spectrum calculation. Second, there is a spinner for setting the V magnitude. And third, there are various input fields for supplying the properties of the spectrum in question. This class provides the generic framework for these panels. In particular, it implements the checkbox and its functionality, as well as the spinner for setting the V magnitude.

See Also:
Serialized Form
